title: Event emote stopped working?
body:
Hello,

I purchased the Worlds event Icon & Emote last week.

When I logged in today they have stopped working?

Is there an issue with them?

replies.body: I'm not seeing any issues right now with the World's Emote on EUW, have you made sure that the icon is still equipped and you're hitting ctrl+6? Lemme know if it's still not working!
